amendment.description: To amend section 5307 of title 49, United States Code, to extend the special rule for the allocation of urbanized area formula grants through fiscal year 2009.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3802 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3802 proposed by Senator Salazar for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S14706; text: CR S14706) To amend section 5307 of title 49, United States Code, to extend the special rule for the allocation of urbanized area formula grants through fiscal year 2009.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3802 proposed by Senator Salazar for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3802 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
